price: 50. Ils ont tramé leur intrigue et Nous avons tramé la Nôtre sans qu’ils n’en sentent rien.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
